title: Oma's Shrimp Dip
markdown:
Nathan,

Oma Dianne has some of the best recipes! When she decided to move from her home into assisted living she allowed me to have her recipe cards. I have not made all of them but I can almost guarantee they are the best. Just like you and your soon to be little brother. I love you dearly.

Mom

* 1 8oz package cream cheese
* ¼ cup lemon juice ( a little less)
* 1 cup cooked shrimp chopped
* ½ cup green pepper
* 1 ¼ oz package onion soup mix
* 1 Tbs horseradish
* 1 cup sour cream
* Mix and store in refrigerator several hours ahead
